creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: color woodblock printed book with red cover; various images of people, landscapes, birds, etc.
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Hokusai's Album of Pictures (Hokusai gafu 北斎画譜)
title: Hokusai's Album of Pictures, vol. 3 complete
